name: H is for HEN
description:
H is for HEN
============

An interactive OBJKT forming part of the “Know your ABCs” series of NFTs, a series of NFTs capturing the memes & terminology of the early days of NFTs.

The various NFTs in the series are available on different blockchains as applicable.

These NFTs are created with JS code developed to assist with generating compositions for drawings made in real life. The intention is for the code to assist with the generation of interesting isometric output that can be interpreted as 3D shapes as well as 2D abstract compositions. For example, without context of other frames some of the still frames in this work can only be interpreted as abstract compositions, while others are more easily seen as recognisable 3D shapes.

Original artwork by Herman Pretorius, 2021

Made with JavaScript (no dependencies).

Series homepage: https://www.sizeight.com/know-your-abcs/

Hot keys
========
SPACE / Left click = Pause
P = Toggle size (Browser size / Print size, 2048 × 2048 px)
R = Refresh color palette
W = Speed up
Z = Slow down
